ShowFishInMinigame.description: Whether to show the fish being caught in the fishing minigame.

CatchSpeed.description: Affects how fast you catch fish.

DrainSpeed.description: Affects how fast the catch bar drains when the bobber isn't on the fish.

StreakForIncreasedQuality.description: Required streak for an increase in quality. For example, 3 means that every 3 consecutive perfect catches increases your catch quality by 1.

MaxNormalFishQuality.description: Determines the max quality fish a non-perfect catch can get, or null for no restrictions.

FishChances.description: The chance that you'll find a fish instead of trash.

MaxFishQuality.description: The max quality fish that can be caught. 0 = normal, 1 = silver, 2 = gold, 3 = iridium, 4+ = beyond iridium.

BaseChance.description: The base chance. Total chance is calculated as locationFactor * (baseChance + sum(factor * thing it's a factor of)), bounded in the range [minChance, maxChance], then bounded once again in the range [0, 1].

StreakFactor.description: The effect that streak has on this chance.

FishingLevelFactor.description: The effect that fishing level has on this chance.

DailyLuckFactor.description: The effect that daily luck has on this chance.

LuckLevelFactor.description: The effect that luck level has on this chance.

LocationFactors.description: The effects that specific locations have on this chance. Keys are location names and values are their factors.
